org.webcurator.domain
Interface ProfileDAO

All Superinterfaces:
BaseDAO
All Known Implementing Classes:
ProfileDAOImpl
public interface ProfileDAO
extends BaseDAO

DAO for loading/saving Profiles to the database.

Author:
bbeaumont
